resources.string: Press the menu button and select \"Add route\" to add a route
The origin and destination stations must be different
You must select a destination station
You must select an origin station
Please wait while real time departure data is loaded...

No departure data is currently available for this route. Note that this route may require a non-standard transfer due to a temporary change in service. Check for service advisories posted at http://m.bart.gov/schedules/advisories/
Could not connect to BART services. Please try again later.
